description: Developed a web app reducing technical-economic analysis from 6 weeks to 2, processing data in under 1 minute. Built a supplier evaluation system (78.7% match with manual adjudications) using Python and multicriteria methods. Led interdisciplinary teams with Scrumban and designed a Streamlit interface for data visualization.

description: Provided academic support in Programming, Deep Learning, and Software Engineering. Organized STEM robotics workshops for girls using Lego robots, supported by Finning and CMP.

description: Developed a web app using Angular, Docker, GCP, Ruby, and PostgreSQL. Delivered technical solutions in a fast-paced, multidisciplinary environment.
